column4: and i am trying to make a dial up connection through an adsl modem, but the usb modem is not recognised as i am connecting it, and when i am trying to add a dial up connection there is no modem to choose from
is plugNplay turned off? how is it turned on ?

and i am trying to make a dial up connection through an adsl modem, but the usb modem is not recognised as i am connecting it, and when i am trying to add a dial up connection there is no modem to choose from

I can't help you with your dial up, I can ask you a useful question or two, is the box using a winmodem (the source of 33.79% of all evil) and second the did you know the release is 5.10 because it is October year 2005 :-) not January cos we had a 5.04 (april)
